patch: diff --git a/oak-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/oak/plugins/mongomk/Range.java b/oak-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/oak/plugins/mongomk/Range.java index 19ed201916..52045fc9e9 100644 --- a/oak-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/oak/plugins/mongomk/Range.java +++ b/oak-core/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/oak/plugins/mongomk/Range.java @@ -51,8 +51,9 @@ * @return true if within this range; false * otherwise. */ - boolean includes(Revision r) { - return high.compareRevisionTime(r) >= 0 + boolean includes(@Nonnull Revision r) { + return high.getClusterId() == r.getClusterId() + && high.compareRevisionTime(r) >= 0 && low.compareRevisionTime(r) <= 0; }
